presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Gender (Diversity Analysis).Gender

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Global Currency Code

presentationColumns.name: Global Currency
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Global Currency

presentationColumns.name: Selection Rate
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Number of Employees with Salary Above Median in Legislative Job Category to Total Number of Employees at End of Year.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Selection Rate

presentationColumns.name: Is Majority
presentationColumns.description: 1 if Highest Selection Rate (or tie) Among for Group within Legislative Job Category, Else 0.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Is Majority

presentationColumns.name: Included in Analysis
presentationColumns.description: Included if Number of Employees >2% of Legislative Job Category, Else Excluded.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Included in Analysis

presentationColumns.name: Chi Square Statistic
presentationColumns.description: Chi-Square Statistic for Comparing Present Group with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Chi Square Statistic

presentationColumns.name: Fishers Exact Odds Ratio
presentationColumns.description: Odds Ratio of Observing Selections in Present Group  with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Fishers Exact Odds Ratio

presentationColumns.name: Fishers Exact p-value
presentationColumns.description: Fisher's Exact Probability of Observing Selections in Present Group  with the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Fishers Exact p-value

presentationColumns.name: Impact Ratio
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Selection Rate of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Impact Ratio

presentationColumns.name: Impact Ratio Adjusted
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of Selection Rate of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate with one greater selection in Present Group and one lesser selection in the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Impact Ratio Adjusted

presentationColumns.name: z-test of Impact Ratios
presentationColumns.description: Standard Error of Ratio of Selection Rates of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).z-test of Impact Ratios

presentationColumns.name: z-test of Difference in Selection Rates
presentationColumns.description: Standard Error of Difference in Selection Rate of Present Group to the Group with the Highest Selection Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).z-test of Difference in Selection Rates

localization.localizationKey: z-test of Difference in Selection Rates

presentationColumns.name: Expected Salary Above Median
presentationColumns.description: Expected Number of Employees with Salary Above Median in Legislative Job Group.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Expected Salary Above Median

presentationColumns.name: Expected Salary Below Median
presentationColumns.description: Expected Number of Employees with Salary Below Median in Legislative Job Group.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Expected Salary Below Median

presentationColumns.name: Combined Diversity Score
presentationColumns.description: Diversity score representative of difference in salary between the present group and the group with the highest salaries. Higher the difference, the greater the score.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Combined Diversity Score

presentationColumns.name: Combined Diversity Score Weighted by Population
presentationColumns.description: Diversity score representative of difference in salary between the present group and the group with the highest salary, weighted by population. Higher the difference, the greater the score.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Combined Diversity Score Weighted by Population

localization.localizationKey: Combined Diversity Score Weighted by Population

presentationColumns.name: Relative Rank by Diversity Score
presentationColumns.description: Ranking Sorted Descending by COMBINED_DIVERSITY_SCORE. The ranks are on a scale of 0-100, with 100 referring to the highest score that are most significant, and 0 the lowest which are least significant.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Salary Details (Gender).Relative Rank by Diversity Score
